components.name: Verify
components.description: May be impacted by SMS delivery issues

components.name: Customer Support Center
components.description: This includes services related to reaching support via phone, email, and chat.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Failures sending to Camtel Network in Cameroon

incident_updates.body: After monitoring for some time, we are still seeing degradation of the service. We're experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to the Camtel network in Cameroon. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 2 hours, or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Middle East & Africa

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Failures to Docomo Network in Guam From Subset of Short Code

incident_updates.body: We are still experiencing SMS delivery failures sending to Docomo network in Guam from a subset of short code. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 4 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

incident_updates.body: This incident causing SMS delivery delays to Zain Network in Sudan was prematurely resolved in one of our previous posts. Please refer to https://status.twilio.com/incidents/sx6v76zcrjch for previous updates. We continue to observe SMS delivery delays to Zain Network in Sudan. Our next update will be provided in 1 hour. We apologize for the inconvenience and for any confusion this may have caused.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Russia SMS Carrier Maintenance - Motiv

incident_updates.body: Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

The Motiv network in Russia is conducting a planned maintenance from 25 April 2023 at 14:00 PDT until 25 April 2023 at 17:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Motiv Russia handsets.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Canada Account Security Service Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body:
Our Service Partner is conducting a planned maintenance from 25 April 2023 at 23:00 PDT until 26 April 2023 at 03:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for the following destination: Canada
Impacted Products: Silent Network Authentication (SNA), Lookup SIM Swap, Identity Match

affected_components.name: ACCOUNT SECURITY - Lookup
CARRIER NETWORK - Verify Silent Network Auth
CARRIER NETWORK - Lookup SIM Swap

scheduled_maintenances.name: Twilio Messaging Services Scheduled Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Twilio is conducting a planned maintenance from 25 April 2023 at 23:00 PDT until 26 April 2023 at 00:00 PDT. During this maintenance window, customers will not be able to add/delete senders or delete a messaging service. Please avoid adding or removing senders or deleting messaging services during this maintenance period. Messages sent with existing messaging services configuration will still function normally.

affected_components.name: PROGRAMMABLE MESSAGING - SMS

incident_updates.body: Our SMS carrier partner in Guyana, Tunisia, and Iraq is conducting a planned maintenance from 26 April 2023 at 12:00 PDT until 26 April 2023 at 12:30 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Digicel – Guyana, Tunisia Telecom – Tunisia and Asia Cell – Iraq handsets.
